headerDisplay: Gate Opener for homebridge for PalGate APP users

deviceId.title: Gate ID
deviceId.description: You can find this in the PalGate app in the settings for the gate

token.title: Token
token.description: Use pylgate by DonutByte to get your token (https://github.com/DonutByte/pylgate/tree/main).

phoneNumber.title: Phone Number
phoneNumber.description: Put the 12 digit phone number for your account here (eg 972500000000

tokenType.title: Token Type
tokenType.description: Set to 1 for Primary or 2 for Secondary.

accessoryType.title: Accessory Type
accessoryType.description: How do you wish to represent the button in HomeKit? default: garageDoor

name.title: Gate name, e.g HomeGate
name.description: Please provide a name to your gate, default: HomeGate
